method.name: are_values_equal
are_dictionaries_equal
are_arrays_equal
method.description:
Check deep-equality between two arrays.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var obj1 := [1, 2] var obj2 := [1, 2] var obj3 := [1, 2, 3]
SxContainer.are_arrays_equal(obj1, obj2) # => true SxContainer.are_arrays_equal(obj1, obj3) # => false ----
